TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SiteMapProvider extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderBase
Public MustInherit Class SiteMapProvider Inherits ProviderBase

summary.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

span.span: Provides a common base class for all site map data providers, and a way for developers to implement custom site map data providers that can be used with the ASP.NET site map infrastructure as persistent stores for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和類別則表示預設實作之抽象類別。The and classes represent the default implementations of the abstract class. 來儲存站台地圖資料會使用名為 Web.sitemap 的 XML 檔案。The uses an XML file named Web.sitemap to store site map data. 如需 Web.sitemap 檔的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網站導覽](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20)。For more information on about the Web.sitemap file, see [ASP.NET Site Maps](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6b85a558-1df8-44cf-bea6-62e61bcc8d20). 類別支援的站台對應提供者階層架構概念，藉由宣告和屬性。The class supports the concept of a site map provider hierarchy, by declaring the and properties. A可以是子系或父系的另一個提供者。A can be a child or parent of another provider. 這可讓不同的內容區域的站台所擁有或維護自己的站台對應和站台對應提供者的開發團隊所實作的位置的案例。This enables scenarios where different content areas of a site are owned or implemented by different development groups that maintain their own site maps and site map providers. 所有Web.config 檔中用來設定物件。All objects are configured in the Web.config files. 這些組態檔中宣告的任何站台對應提供者執行階段時載入，而且可用來載入並處理站台瀏覽資料。Any site map providers that are declared in these configuration files are loaded at run time and are used to load and process site navigation data. 物件，可追蹤的所有提供者，皆可透過其屬性集合，提供程式設計的存取由提供者所管理的瀏覽資料。The object, which keeps track of all the providers that are available to it through its property collection, provides programmatic access to the navigation data that is managed by the providers. 下列程式碼範例示範用來宣告在 Web.config 檔案中的站台地圖提供者的格式。The following code example demonstrates the format that is used to declare a site map provider in a Web.config file. ``` ``` 這些提供者所載入的站台瀏覽資料由其他元件的站台對應基礎結構，例如和控制項，以顯示使用者的站台對應資訊。The site navigation data that is loaded by these providers is used by other components of the site map infrastructure, such as the and controls, to display site map information for users. 如果您實作您自己的站台地圖提供者，您可以在 ASP.NET 應用程式的 App_Code 目錄中的原始程式檔，然後將組件將會自動編譯。If you implement your own site map provider, you can place the source file in the App_Code directory of your ASP.NET application, and then the assembly will be compiled automatically. 您也可以全域組件快取 (GAC) 中，將您自己的站台地圖提供者，並提供其完整限定參考的 Web.config 檔案中。You can also place your own site map provider in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC), and provide a fully-qualified reference to it in the Web.config file. 如需編譯器服務的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用組件和全域組件快取](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information on compiler services, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何撰寫會實作抽象類別類別。The following code example demonstrates how to write a class that implements the abstract class. 這個範例包含只是範例及與它的運作方式的範例文字檔案。This example includes only a sample and a sample text file that works with it. 要執行此範例也需要在 Web.config 檔案和.aspx 網頁中的項目。To run the example you also need an entry in the Web.config file and an .aspx page. 您也可以將這些文件中找到屬性。You can find these in the documentation for the property. 此範例會使用逗號分隔的檔案之後載入 sitemap 資訊預期的結構。The example uses a comma-delimited file that follows an expected structure to load sitemap information. 檔案的第一行代表 sitemap 的根節點，而接下來幾行的子節點。The first line of the file represents the root node of the sitemap, and subsequent lines are subnodes. 每一個子節點識別其父節點的 url。Each subnode identifies its parent node by URL. 符合這些準則的檔案的範例如下所示。An example of a file that meets these criteria is shown below. ``` default.aspx,Home,MyCompany Home Page, sale.aspx,Now On Sale,Check Out These Great Deals!,default.aspx catalog.aspx,Online Catalog,Browse Our Many Great Items!,default.aspx ``` `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`提供所有的範例實作屬性和方法。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` provides example implementations of all the properties and methods. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫方法，並提供邏輯加入與指定的父站台對應提供者所維護的節點集合的物件。Classes deriving from the class can override the method and provide logic for adding a object with a specified parent to the node collection that is maintained by the site map provider. 例如，方法會將所指定的物件`node`至集合是由維護物件，並建立之間的父子式關聯性所指定的物件`node`和`parentNode`。For example, the method adds the object that is specified by `node` to the collection that is maintained by the object and creates a parent/child relationship between the object that is specified by `node` and `parentNode`. 預設實作方法會擲回例外狀況。The default implementation of the method throws a exception.

span.span: In all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發之前嘗試擷取物件，以便讓傳回的執行個體的事件訂閱者類別。The event is raised before attempting to retrieve a object, to enable event subscribers to return an instance of the class. 如果沒有任何事件訂閱者，類別會呼叫方法用於擷取目前的 HTTP 內容，代表目前要求的頁面。If there are no event subscribers, the class calls the method using the current HTTP context to retrieve a that represents the currently requested page. 如果目前要求的頁面不會對應至，`null`傳回。If the currently requested page does not correspond with a , `null` is returned. 如果安全性調整已啟用，而且不允許使用者存取，`null`傳回。If security trimming is enabled and the user is not permitted to access the , `null` is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作會實作抽象類別中的屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別必須實作抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. 提供的 URL 可以是虛擬的或絕對的 URL。The URL provided can be a virtual or absolute URL. 它也可以使用應用程式相對的語法，例如 URL `~/apprelativedirectory`。It might also be a URL that uses application-relative syntax, such as `~/apprelativedirectory`. 請確定任何實作方法剖析，並適當地處理應用程式相對的語法。Ensure that any implementation of the method parse and handle application-relative syntax properly. 類別，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，使用的 URL做為索引鍵中的維護類別的各種集合物件。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a object as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果提供 URL，它必須是唯一的站台對應提供者的範圍內。Therefore, if a provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未不提供任何 URL，則產生的唯一識別碼識別。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法會實作抽象類別中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`使用 helper 方法，名為`FindUrl`、 取得目前顯示的頁面從 URL物件。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses a helper method, named `FindUrl`, to get the URL of the currently displayed page from the object. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#5)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#8)]

span.para: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必將搜尋延伸至任何子系的提供者，如果URL 相符的物件中找不到提供者目前的站台對應，且提供者支援子項提供者。

When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to extend the search to any child providers, if a object that matches the URL is not found by the provider in the current site map and the provider supports child providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會呼叫抽象方法來擷取物件的目前要求的網頁的原始 URL 或根據要求的虛擬路徑。The method calls the abstract method to retrieve a object for the currently requested page based on the raw URL or the virtual path of the request. 如果沒有對應位於，`null`傳回。If no corresponding is found in the , `null` is returned. 方法不會檢查是否預設的使用者進行存取。The method does not check whether a is accessible to a user, by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作會傳回`null`在所有情況下。The implementation returns `null` in all cases. 類別衍生自類別可以覆寫唯一索引鍵為基礎的方法，以提供查閱功能 (而不是 URL，這由方法)。Classes that derive from the class can override the method to provide lookup functionality based on a unique key (instead of a URL, which is used by the method). 實作方法，如果您的站台對應提供者實作會使用屬性物件為主要網站導覽結構中的識別項。Implement the method if your site map provider implementation uses the property of a object as a primary identifier in a site map structure. 類別會提供實作以處理搜尋未定義 URL 的站台對應節點。The class provides an implementation that handles searching for site map nodes that do not define a URL. 類別，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，使用的 URL做為索引鍵中的各種集合的維護類別。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, uses the URL of a as a key in the various collections that the classes maintain. 因此，如果節點提供 URL，它必須是唯一的範圍內的站台地圖提供者。Therefore, if a node provides a URL, it must be unique within the scope of the site map provider. 如果未不提供任何 URL，則產生的唯一識別碼識別。If no URL is provided, a unique identifier is generated to identify the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別必須實作抽象方法。Classes that derive from the class must implement the abstract method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法會實作抽象類別中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`儲存階層式父子式關聯性中其中一個物件及其所有中另一個物件。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` stores the hierarchical parent/child relationships in one object and all objects in another. 方法會執行使用這兩個反向查閱物件。The method performs a reverse-lookup using both objects. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#6)]

span.para: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必在子節點上執行安全性調整，並確認傳回的集合是唯讀的。集合包含只有的直接子系指定的。

When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to perform security trimming on the child nodes and ensure that the returned collection is read-only. The collection contains only the immediate children of the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法會傳回屬性; 不過，站台對應提供者可以覆寫方法，並提供用來傳回目前的自訂快取機制最佳化的實作，以及之父系的父系及祖系節點。The default implementation of the method returns the property; however, site map providers can override the method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current , as well as the parent and ancestor nodes of the parent. `upLevel`參數用來指定多少層的擷取父系及祖系節點。The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve. 如果願意的話父系及祖系節點可以連結至所傳回的物件方法，使用屬性。If preferred, the parent and ancestor nodes can be linked to the object that is returned by the method, using the property. 類別，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，會快取在記憶體中，這會產生少量或沒有的額外負荷，查詢時的整個站台對應特定物件。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the for specific objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法會傳回屬性; 不過，站台對應提供者可以覆寫方法，並提供用來傳回目前的自訂快取機制最佳化的實作物件，以及物件中目前的接近度。The default implementation of the method returns the property; however, site map providers can override the method and provide an optimized implementation that uses custom caching mechanisms to return the current object, as well as objects that are in the proximity of the current . `upLevel`參數用來指定多少層的擷取及快取，以及其直屬子系的父系及祖系節點。The `upLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of parent and ancestor nodes to retrieve and cache, along with their immediate children. `downLevel`參數用來指定多少層的子系的節點，從目前擷取。The `downLevel` parameter is used to specify how many levels of descendant nodes from the current to retrieve. 如果願意的話的上階和下階節點可以連結至，由If preferred, the ancestor and descendant nodes can be linked to the that is returned by the 方法中，使用和屬性。 method, using the and properties. 如果有較少上階或子節點層級超過所指定`upLevel`或`downLevel`，只有可擷取。If there are fewer ancestor or child node levels than are specified by `upLevel` or `downLevel`, only those that are available are retrieved. 類別，這是 ASP.NET 的預設站台對應提供者，會快取在記憶體中，這會產生少量或沒有的額外負荷，查詢時的整個站台對應特定物件。The class, which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET, caches the entire site map in memory, which results in little or no overhead when querying the for specific objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法不會實際建立站台對應，它只會準備的狀態物件，若要這樣做。The method does not actually build a site map, it only prepares the state of the object to do so. 預設實作初始化站台地圖提供者，從站台瀏覽設定的屬性。The default implementation initializes the property for the site map provider from the site navigation configuration. 類別衍生自可以覆寫方法來初始化任何狀態和永續性儲存體中載入網站導覽資料所需的資源。Classes that derive from the can override the method to initialize any state and resources that are required to load site map data from persistent storage. 例如，如果您的衍生的類別來儲存站台地圖資料使用檔案，任何檔案執行初始設定可以在方法。For example, if your derived class is using files to store site map data, any file initialization can be performed in the method. 如果衍生的類別使用的其他類型的資料存放區，例如關聯式資料庫中，可能會執行初始化資料庫連接。If the derived class uses some other type of data store, such as a relational database, initializing a database connection might be performed. 其他屬性，例如檔案名稱或連接字串是 ASP.NET 組態系統被讀取，並傳遞至方法及其參數。Additional attributes, such as file names or connection strings, are read by the ASP.NET configuration system and passed to the method with its parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以準備 Microsoft Access 資料庫連接。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to prepare a Microsoft Access database connection. 連接字串物件傳入參數方法。The connection string for the object is passed in the parameter of the method. 在此情況下，在 Web.config 檔案中的特定提供者 > 一節會提供連接字串。In this case, the connection string is provided by the provider-specific section in the Web.config file. 在這裡，`accessSiteMapConnectionString`包含裝載站台地圖資料的 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串。Here, `accessSiteMapConnectionString` contains a connection string to a Microsoft Access database that hosts the site map data. ``` ``` 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CPP/accesssitemapprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/CS/accesssitemapprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.AccessSiteMapProvider_1/VB/accesssitemapprovider.vb#2)]

span.para: 在覆寫第一次呼叫的方法在衍生類別中，務必基底類別，然後再執行您自己的初始化方法。
When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to first call the method for the base class before performing your own initializations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 安全性調整已啟用時的預設行為是下表中所述。The default behavior when security trimming is enabled is as described in the following table. |條件Condition|傳回值Return Value| |---------------|------------------| |存在於`node`和目前的使用者是在至少一個指定的角色。The exists on `node` and the current user is in at least one of the specified roles.

-或-- or -

目前的執行緒都有相關聯`WindowsIdentity`有為所要求的檔案存取權的 URL 和 URL 是位於應用程式的目錄結構。The current thread has an associated `WindowsIdentity` that has file access to the requested URL and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.

-或-- or -

目前的使用者已獲授權特別要求的 URL 中`authorization`目前應用程式和 URL 的項目是位於應用程式的目錄結構。The current user is authorized specifically for the requested URL in the `authorization` element for the current application and the URL is located within the directory structure for the application.|`true`| |符合上述條件。None of the preceding conditions is met.|`false`|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作抽象的所有類別類別可支援的站台對應提供者階層概念。All classes that implement the abstract class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 提供者之間的任何階層式關聯性會維護範圍之外由提供者本身的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 如需功能的提供者階層的範例，請參閱。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作會實作抽象類別中的屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. When overriding the property in a derived class, be sure that the implementation does not navigate the provider hierarchy, if one exists, to find the absolute root node of the site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有類別可實作類別可支援的站台對應提供者階層概念。All classes that implement the class can support the concept of a site map provider hierarchy. 提供者之間的任何階層式關聯性會維護範圍之外由提供者本身的集合。Any hierarchical relationships between providers are maintained outside the scope of a collection by the providers themselves. 如需功能的提供者階層的範例，請參閱。For an example of a functional provider hierarchy, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作會實作抽象類別中的屬性類別。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a class that implements the abstract class. `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`會使用簡單的邏輯來判斷目前的提供者是否為提供者階層的一部分。The `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` uses simple logic to determine whether the current provider is part of a provider hierarchy. 如果提供者是階層的一部分，它會使用父提供者當做其本身的屬性。If the provider is part of a hierarchy, it uses the property for the parent provider as its own. 如果提供者不是階層的一部分，提供者是它自己的根提供者。If the provider is not part of a hierarchy, the provider is its own root provider. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/CS/simpletextsitemapprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.SimpleTextSiteMapProvider_1/VB/simpletextsitemapprovider.vb#4)]

exception.span: There is a circular reference to the current site map provider.

span.span: There is a circular reference to the current site map provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 無法以程式設計方式設定安全性調整 — 提供者組態中設定。Security trimming cannot be set programmatically—it is set in the configuration for the provider.

summary.span: Occurs when the property is called.

span.span: Occurs when the property is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建立表示目前要求的頁面，而不需要實作自訂站台地圖提供者藉由訂閱事件。You can create a representation of the currently requested page without implementing a custom site map provider by subscribing to the event. 訂閱者附加接收通知的物件時屬性呼叫，而且可以傳回自訂物件而不是所傳回的其中一個預設屬性。Subscribers attach a object to receive notification when the property is called and can return a custom object instead of the default one that is returned by the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
